Crown Prosecution Service said it would re-examine material collected by police officers who investigated allegations that journalists at the newspaper illegally accessed the voicemail of several public figures. Keir Starmer , the Director of Public Prosecutions, announced a comprehensive assessment of all material in the possession of the Metropolitan Police Service relating to phone hacking. The allegations concern the behaviour of journalists during the time that Mr Andy Coulson was editor of the newspaper.
